title: Jim McMahon – 2021 Comments on BP Closing Some Petrol Stations
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jim McMahon, the Shadow Transport Secretary, on 23 September 2021.
content:
This is a rapidly worsening crisis that the Government has failed to heed the warnings of for a decade, never investing in or valuing working class jobs.
